original_text: Now those who had been scattered by the persecution that broke out when Stephen was killed traveled as far as Phoenicia, Cyprus and Antioch, spreading the word only among Jews.
korean_text: 그 때에 스데반의 일로 일어난 환난으로 말미암아 흩어진 자들이 베니게와 구브로와 안디옥까지 이르러 유대인에게만 말씀을 전하는데

sentences.original_text: Now those who had been scattered by persecution
that broke out when Stephen was killed
traveled as far as Phoenicia, Cyprus and Antioch
spreading the word only among Jews
